title: How do I view a web page in full screen or save a web page to bookmarks?
answer:
To view a web page in full screen, on the browser screen, touch the menu button. From the displayed option menu, choose Settings > Labs and select Fullscreen. 

 [To save a web page to bookmarks, on the browser screen, touch the menu button. From the displayed option menu, choose Save to bookmarks, and then touch OK.]()
